content: The Snake Herbalist fights like all other enemies of its type. Its main weapons are a sharp spear and its long neck that it can use to strike you at very high speeds. The Snake Herbalist pulls its neck all the way back before launching this attack, giving you a visual indication of when to dodge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snake_Herbalist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Snake Herbalist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Herbalist Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Snake Herbalist fights like all other enemies of its type. Its main weapons are a sharp spear and its long neck that it can use to strike you at very high speeds. The Snake Herbalist pulls its neck all the way back before launching this attack, giving you a visual indication of when to dodge.
